Name: Air Lock
Description: While this Pokemon is active, the effects of weather conditions are disabled.

Name: Arena Trap
Description: Prevents adjacent opposing Pokemon from choosing to switch out unless they are immune to trapping or are airborne.

Name: Battle Armor
Description: This Pokemon cannot be struck by a critical hit.

Name: Blaze
Description: When this Pokemon has 1/3 or less of its maximum HP, rounded down, its Fire-type attacks have their power multiplied by 1.5.

Name: Chlorophyll
Description: If Sunny Day is active, this Pokemon's Speed is doubled.

Name: Clear Body
Description: Prevents other Pokemon from lowering this Pokemon's stat stages.

Name: Cloud Nine
Description: While this Pokemon is active, the effects of weather conditions are disabled.

Name: Color Change
Description: This Pokemon's type changes to match the type of the last move that hit it, unless that type is already one of its types. This effect applies after each hit from a multi-hit move. This effect does not happen if this Pokemon did not lose HP from the attack.

Name: Compound Eyes
Description: This Pokemon's moves have their accuracy multiplied by 1.3.

Name: Cute Charm
Description: There is a 1/3 chance a Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon will become infatuated if it is of the opposite gender. This effect does not happen if this Pokemon did not lose HP from the attack.

Name: Damp
Description: While this Pokemon is active, Explosion, Self-Destruct, and the Aftermath Ability are prevented from having an effect.

Name: Drizzle
Description: On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Rain Dance.

Name: Drought
Description: On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Sunny Day.

Name: Early Bird
Description: This Pokemon's sleep counter drops by 2 instead of 1.

Name: Effect Spore
Description: 10% chance a Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon will be poisoned, paralyzed, or fall asleep. This effect does not happen if this Pokemon did not lose HP from the attack.

Name: Flame Body
Description: 1/3 chance a Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon will be burned. This effect does not happen if this Pokemon did not lose HP from the attack.

Name: Flash Fire
Description: This Pokemon is immune to Fire-type moves, as long as it is not frozen. The first time it is hit by a Fire-type move, damage from its Fire-type attacks will be multiplied by 1.5 as long as it remains active and has this Ability. If this Pokemon has a non-volatile status condition, is a Fire type, or has a substitute, Will-O-Wisp will not activate this Ability.

Name: Forecast
Description: If this Pokemon is a Castform, its type changes to the current weather condition's type, except Sandstorm.

Name: Guts
Description: If this Pokemon has a non-volatile status condition, its Attack is multiplied by 1.5; burn's physical damage halving is ignored.

Name: Huge Power
Description: This Pokemon's Attack is doubled.

Name: Hustle
Description: This Pokemon's Attack is multiplied by 1.5 and the accuracy of its physical attacks is multiplied by 0.8.

Name: Hyper Cutter
Description: Prevents other Pokemon from lowering this Pokemon's Attack stat stage.

Name: Illuminate
Description: No competitive use.

Name: Immunity
Description: This Pokemon cannot be poisoned. Gaining this Ability while poisoned cures it.

Name: Inner Focus
Description: This Pokemon cannot be made to flinch.

Name: Insomnia
Description: This Pokemon cannot fall asleep. Gaining this Ability while asleep cures it.

Name: Intimidate
Description: On switch-in, this Pokemon lowers the Attack of adjacent opposing Pokemon by 1 stage. Pokemon behind a substitute are immune.

Name: Keen Eye
Description: Prevents other Pokemon from lowering this Pokemon's accuracy stat stage.

Name: Levitate
Description: This Pokemon is immune to Ground-type attacks and the effects of Spikes and the Arena Trap Ability.

Name: Lightning Rod
Description: If this Pokemon is not the target of a single-target Electric-type move used by an opposing Pokemon, this Pokemon redirects that move to itself. This effect considers Hidden Power a Normal-type move.

Name: Limber
Description: This Pokemon cannot be paralyzed. Gaining this Ability while paralyzed cures it.

Name: Liquid Ooze
Description: This Pokemon damages those draining HP from it for as much as they would heal.

Name: Magma Armor
Description: This Pokemon cannot be frozen. Gaining this Ability while frozen cures it.

Name: Magnet Pull
Description: Prevents adjacent opposing Steel-type Pokemon from choosing to switch out unless they are immune to trapping.

Name: Marvel Scale
Description: If this Pokemon has a non-volatile status condition, its Defense is multiplied by 1.5.

Name: Minus
Description: If an active Pokemon has the Plus Ability, this Pokemon's Special Attack is multiplied by 1.5.

Name: Natural Cure
Description: This Pokemon has its non-volatile status condition cured when it switches out.

Name: Oblivious
Description: This Pokemon cannot be infatuated. Gaining this Ability while infatuated cures it.

Name: Overgrow
Description: When this Pokemon has 1/3 or less of its maximum HP, rounded down, its Grass-type attacks have their power multiplied by 1.5.

Name: Own Tempo
Description: This Pokemon cannot be confused. Gaining this Ability while confused cures it.

Name: Pickup
Description: No competitive use.

Name: Plus
Description: If an active Pokemon has the Minus Ability, this Pokemon's Special Attack is multiplied by 1.5.

Name: Poison Point
Description: 1/3 chance a Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon will be poisoned. This effect does not happen if this Pokemon did not lose HP from the attack.

Name: Pressure
Description: If this Pokemon is the target of another Pokemon's move, that move loses one additional PP.

Name: Pure Power
Description: This Pokemon's Attack is doubled.

Name: Rain Dish
Description: If Rain Dance is active, this Pokemon restores 1/16 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn.

Name: Rock Head
Description: This Pokemon does not take recoil damage besides Struggle, Life Orb, and crash damage.

Name: Rough Skin
Description: Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon lose 1/16 of their maximum HP, rounded down. This effect does not happen if this Pokemon did not lose HP from the attack.

Name: Run Away
Description: No competitive use.

Name: Sand Stream
Description: On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Sandstorm.

Name: Sand Veil
Description: If Sandstorm is active, this Pokemon's evasiveness is multiplied by 1.25. This Pokemon takes no damage from Sandstorm.

Name: Serene Grace
Description: This Pokemon's moves have their secondary effect chance doubled.

Name: Shadow Tag
Description: Prevents opposing Pokemon from choosing to switch out.

Name: Shed Skin
Description: This Pokemon has a 33% chance to have its non-volatile status condition cured at the end of each turn.

Name: Shell Armor
Description: This Pokemon cannot be struck by a critical hit.

Name: Shield Dust
Description: This Pokemon is not affected by the secondary effect of another Pokemon's attack.

Name: Soundproof
Description: This Pokemon is immune to sound-based moves, including Heal Bell.

Name: Speed Boost
Description: This Pokemon's Speed is raised by 1 stage at the end of each full turn it has been on the field.

Name: Static
Description: 1/3 chance a Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon will be paralyzed. This effect does not happen if this Pokemon did not lose HP from the attack.

Name: Stench
Description: No competitive use.

Name: Sticky Hold
Description: This Pokemon cannot lose its held item due to another Pokemon's attack.

Name: Sturdy
Description: OHKO moves fail when used against this Pokemon.

Name: Suction Cups
Description: This Pokemon cannot be forced to switch out by another Pokemon's attack or item.

Name: Swarm
Description: When this Pokemon has 1/3 or less of its maximum HP, rounded down, its Bug-type attacks have their power multiplied by 1.5.

Name: Swift Swim
Description: If Rain Dance is active, this Pokemon's Speed is doubled.

Name: Synchronize
Description: If another Pokemon burns, paralyzes, or poisons this Pokemon, that Pokemon receives the same non-volatile status condition. If another Pokemon badly poisons this Pokemon, that Pokemon becomes poisoned.

Name: Thick Fat
Description: If a Pokemon uses a Fire- or Ice-type attack against this Pokemon, that Pokemon's attacking stat is halved when calculating the damage to this Pokemon.

Name: Torrent
Description: When this Pokemon has 1/3 or less of its maximum HP, rounded down, its Water-type attacks have their power multiplied by 1.5.

Name: Trace
Description: On switch-in, or when this Pokemon acquires this ability, this Pokemon copies a random adjacent opposing Pokemon's Ability. However, if one or more adjacent Pokemon has the Ability "No Ability", Trace won't copy anything even if there is another valid Ability it could normally copy. Otherwise, if there is no Ability that can be copied at that time, this Ability will activate as soon as an Ability can be copied. Abilities that cannot be copied are the previously mentioned "No Ability", as well as Battle Bond, Comatose, Disguise, Flower Gift, Forecast, Illusion, Imposter, Multitype, Power Construct, Power of Alchemy, Receiver, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Trace, and Zen Mode.

Name: Truant
Description: This Pokemon skips every other turn instead of using a move.

Name: Vital Spirit
Description: This Pokemon cannot fall asleep. Gaining this Ability while asleep cures it.

Name: Volt Absorb
Description: This Pokemon is immune to damaging Electric-type moves and restores 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, when hit by one.

Name: Water Absorb
Description: This Pokemon is immune to Water-type moves and restores 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, when hit by a Water-type move.

Name: Water Veil
Description: This Pokemon cannot be burned. Gaining this Ability while burned cures it.

Name: White Smoke
Description: Prevents other Pokemon from lowering this Pokemon's stat stages.

Name: Wonder Guard
Description: This Pokemon is only damaged by supereffective moves and indirect damage.
